name: Trusted Labs
tagline: Creating Trust in a connected world
description: Trusted Labs is a global expert in security consulting and evaluation within the connected ecosystem, and is the world leader in security certification scheme definition. We are the security partner for major organizations worldwide that design, develop, evaluate and integrate connected solutions. We also enable certification and industry bodies to set and achieve their security objectives by designing the necessary methodologies, processes and tools.

locations.address: 6 rue de la Verrerie – CS20001 – France
